lines.line: Every night, I wait by the window hoping they'll come back for me.
I still remember when I wasn't alone, when I had a family that loved me.
We used to play together with my favorite toys.
And cuddle close on cold nights, feeling safe and warm.
But one day, they packed their things and left me behind.
Now I spend my days hiding from the world.
Sometimes I gather courage to explore, hoping to find them.
I'll keep watching and waiting, dreaming of the day someone will love me again.

parsed_script.full_script: Every night, I wait by the window hoping they'll come back for me.  I still remember when I wasn't alone, when I had a family that loved me.  We used to play together with my favorite toys.  And cuddle close on cold nights, feeling safe and warm.  But one day, they packed their things and left me behind.  Now I spend my days hiding from the world.  Sometimes I gather courage to explore, hoping to find them.  I'll keep watching and waiting, dreaming of the day someone will love me again.
